title: Introduction to Physics
description: A comprehensive introduction to the fundamental principles of physics, including mechanics, thermodynamics, and electromagnetism.

title: Classical Mechanics
description: Advanced study of classical mechanics, including Lagrangian and Hamiltonian formulations, rigid body dynamics, and oscillations.

title: Quantum Mechanics
description: Introduction to quantum mechanics, covering wave functions, Schr√∂dinger equation, and quantum systems.
